sale_price_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_module=”6203″][/et_pb_wc_price][et_pb_text content_phone=”

Your Intelligent Companion robot is here, ready to befriend, entertain, teach, and communicate in a wide variety of scenarios. Alpha Mini is highly portable, bringing fun interactions and a wealth of expressions and functionality, including voice interaction, 4G LTE connectivity, face recognition, illustrated book recognition, and object recognition.

” content_last_edited=”off|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_text_color=”#6B6B6B” header_font_size=”20px” header_letter_spacing=”1px” header_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”||||false|true” custom_margin_phone=”0px|30px|-9px|30px|false|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|phone” custom_padding=”||||true|true” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

The course is based on the humanoid robot Alpha Mini, combined with graphic programming(uCode) and open-sourced hardware for development. Per the standard of science curriculum of elementary schools, students would obtain the knowledge such as science, technology, engineering, art and mathematics, which is organically integrated and guided by project learning and problem-solving methods. And the learning activities such as observation, investigation, research, experiment and trial would be carried out. By learning using graphical programming tools, students can learn to call the vision, voice and other functional modules of the humanoid robot, and then learn to program the humanoid robot, experience the charm of AI in programming, and stimulate their interest in learning scientific knowledge. By applying the open-sourced hardware, actuators and sensors, building intelligent device models, making virtual real interactive animation, exploring the mysteries of modern science and technology life, students’ scientific skills would be comprehensively improved.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_wc_add_to_cart disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ fields_background_color=”#0C71C3″ fields_focus_background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” This teaching kit supports 15 theme courses for teaching AI Super Assistant with customized education edition of Alpha Mini and AI Super Assistant Accessory Kit.

AI Super Assistant Accessory Kit includes:

  • 1 explore development board;
  • 1 servo driver;
  • 2 infrared sensors, 2 touch sensors, 1 Light sensors, 1 sound sensor;
  • 2 LED light modules, 1 universal wheel;
  • 10 W1-BLU Cables, 8 W2-GRY Cables, 4 W3-BLK Cables, 2 W4-BLK Cables, 1 USB Cable;
  • ≥750 plastic parts, 1 lithium battery, 1 power adapter.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”align-self: center;”][et_pb_image src=”../../../../../ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_Super_Assistant_02.png” title_text=”Book_Super_Assistant_02″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”../../../../../vn/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_13.jpg” custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” global_module=”7104″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

HARDWARE – CONTROLLERS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][dsm_image_carousel gallery_ids=”4667,7052,7050,4668″ slide_to_scroll=”2″ autoplay=”off” slide_to_show_tablet=”2″ slide_to_show_phone=”” slide_to_show_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/dsm_image_carousel][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”../../../../../vn/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_26.png” title_text=”Book_26″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

uKit Control Box

  • Provided for: the lower grades of elementary schools;
  • Supporting hardware: the patented servos of UBTECH, sensors and building the system of block parts;
  • Supporting software: UKIT EDU & UBTECH EDU for learning Blockly programming and Pose-record-play

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||||false|false” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;||flex-wrap: wrap;”][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element_phone=”order:2;” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”order:2;”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

uKit Explore Development Board

  • Provided for: the higher grades of elementary schools to junior high schools
  • Supporting Hardware: the open-sourced development board based on Arduino platform; the patented Servos of UBTECH, sensors and the system of block parts, a variety of sensors and actuator modules;
  • Supporting Software: uCode, Explore & Arduino for learning Blockly programming and text coding on PC

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element_phone=”order:1;” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”order:1;”][et_pb_image src=”../../../../../vn/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_27.png” title_text=”Book_27″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f2f2f2″ custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” global_module=”7105″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#6B6B6B” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

HARDWARE – ACTUATORS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” width=”20%” width_tablet=”40%” width_phone=”60%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom” custom_css_main_element=”display:flex;”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”../../../../../vn/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_17.png” title_text=”Book_17″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”../../../../../vn/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_18.png” title_text=”Book_18″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#6B6B6B” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

The actuator is the joint organization of the robot, which can drive the robots to do various actions and functions. The actuators are mainly composed of servos and motors with the exclusive patents of UBTECH.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”../../../../../vn/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_13.jpg” custom_padding=”50px||50px||false|false” global_module=”7107″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

HARDWARE – STRUCTURAL PARTS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_line_height=”1.5em” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

  • Introduction: the system of blocks with the patents of UBTECH;
  • Design: innovative buckle-type & pin buckle connection;
  • Include: connectors, decorative parts, fastening parts, connecting cables and others;
  • Color: mainly light gray, dark gray, green, yellow, black, blue & silver;
  • Other concern: environmentally safe and durable.

By using these structural parts, users can quickly design and build their own creative models to learn, understand and apply the AI technology.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”../../../../../vn/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_19.png” title_text=”Book_19″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f2f2f2″ custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” global_module=”7108″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#6B6B6B” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

HARDWARE – SENSORS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][dipl_image_card_carousel cards_per_slide=”4″ slides_per_group=”3″ show_arrow=”on” show_control_dot=”on” cards_per_slide_tablet=”3″ cards_per_slide_phone=”2″ cards_per_slide_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” content_text_align=”center” content_font_size=”20px” text_orientation=”center” content_font_size_tablet=”” content_font_size_phone=”16px” content_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”][dipl_image_card_carousel_item image=”../../../../../vn/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Book_22.png” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” content_font_size_tablet=”” content_font_size_phone=”16px” content_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

uKit Edu APP

  • Type: APP for Android and IOS;
  • With: blocks, sensors, servos and control box;
  • To: enable children to build vivid and interesting robot models through official customized course materials, and to program and design through the graphical programming, pose-record play and multi-functional remote control.
  • Aim: In the process of enjoying robot building and remote control,
    children can imperceptibly establish the thinking logic of space structure and code programming, which lays the foundation for their future AI learning.
